section.name: Statistics
section.p: If you enable statistics, Dozer will collect a number of runtime mapping metrics. These statistics are global and can be accessed via the GlobalStatistics object. The statistics are also available via JMX. Dozer is distributed with a fully functional JMX DozerStatisticsControllerMBean.
Based on our profiling numbers, the overhead of enabling statistics is roughly 3-5%.

tr.td: # of failures per exception type. This statistic shows what specific exceptions are being thrown when mappings fail
# of failures per source and destination class names. This statistic shows which specific mappings have failed per unique src class name and dest class name
